code: import React from'react';import'./App.css';import Sidebar from'./Sidebar';import ExpandMore from'@material-ui/icons/ExpandMore';import Chat from'./Chat';import{selectUser}from'./features/userSlice';import{useDispatch,useSelector}from'react-redux';import Login from'./Login';import{useEffect}from'react';import{auth}from'./firebase';import{login,logout}from'./features/userSlice';function App(){var dispatch=useDispatch();var user=useSelector(selectUser);useEffect(function(){auth.onAuthStateChanged(function(authUser){console.log(authUser);if(authUser){dispatch(login({uid:authUser.uid,photo:authUser.photoURL,email:authUser.email,displayName:authUser.displayName}));}else{dispatch(logout());}});},[dispatch]);console.log(user);return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"app"},user?/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(React.Fragment,null,/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Sidebar,null),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Chat,null)):/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Login,null));}export default App;
